name: Hektor: The Dating Simulator
description:
heyyyy besties :))))) here's that Hektor dating sim y'all asked for lol

there's 2 good, 2 bad, and 2 neutral endings, go find all 6 and come back to me when you find them for a prize :)

I tried to make the game as gender-neutral as possible so there's not a lot of the player being referred to in the third person lol

so srry for all the Paris slander lol

shout out to @kirbymoos, @1986toyotacorolla, and @vapor.mutt on instagram for rlly pushing me to do this game, y'all seemed the most hyped abt this lol, love y'all <3
